title: KINTRACLASH
description: A silent performance competition for teams of 4-10 participants, where black-and-white-clad artists convey creative and socially relevant stories through expressions and body language.

title: Stress relief Terracotta clay modelling session
description: Participants will be given a theme, they have to complete their clay model project in 90mins. Participants will be provided with clay, modelling tools, paint.

title: Raagangal 16
description: The quest for the most soulful voice begins – are you ready to take the mic?

title: Dragons, Dice, and Destiny
club: THE NEXT CHAPTER - BOOK CLUB and The Otaku Club
description: Join us for an unforgettable Dungeons & Dragons campaign, where every roll of the dice weaves a new chapter. The adventure is yours to create—are you ready to answer the call?

title: Roadies: Thrillville Trials
description: An electrifying event designed to push participants to their limits through meticulously crafted challenges, testing physical strength, mental agility, strategic thinking, and resilience.

title: Squid Survivors
description: A thrilling Indian adaptation of Squid Games featuring childhood games rooted in Indian tradition. Experience strategy, teamwork, and endurance in this high-stakes competition.

title: Phantom Files
description: A murder mystery experience, where teams of 2-4 uncover the hidden truth armed with a detailed case file. Guided by cryptic 'ghost' tips, they piece together evidence across various locations.

title: Emerald City: Rizzverse
description: A campus-wide, meme-fueled treasure hunt packed with fire riddles, sus vibes, and mog-worthy chaos. Pull up, flex your drip, and prove you're built different!

title: Creative Writing
description: Channel your inner Shakespeare and pour your creativity onto paper. Write down your best story, poem or prose to show how you make the best of a given prompt.

title: Aatanayagan
description: Step into a world of rhythm and grace, where every move tells a story.
